snippet: Schalke 04 forward Klaas-Jan Huntelaar has signed a new two-year contract that will keep him at the Bundesliga club until 2017, the team and player said on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Schalke Striker Huntelaar Extends Deal to 2017
headline.main: Schalke Striker Huntelaar Extends Deal to 2017

lead_paragraph: Schalke 04 forward Klaas-Jan Huntelaar has signed a new two-year contract that will keep him at the Bundesliga club until 2017, the team and player said on Saturday.
